TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CookieContainer extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 对象的集合提供容器。

span.span: Provides a container for a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种数据结构, 它为类的实例提供存储, 并以类似于数据库的方式访问。 A is a data structure that provides storage for instances of the class, and which is accessed in a database-like manner. 具有一个容量限制, 该限制是在创建容器或由属性更改时设置的。The has a capacity limit that is set when the container is created or changed by a property. 类的实例根据其源 URI 添加到容器中。An instance of the class is added to the container based on its originating URI. 它会添加到与 URI 关联的内部。It is added to an internal associated with the URI. 从基于 URI 的容器中检索, 或者作为可用于提交 HTTP WebRequests 的字符串从容器中检索。 A is retrieved from the container based on the URI as a , or as a string that can be used to submit HTTP WebRequests. 有三个属性, 这些属性控制容器的内容量: 、 和。 The has three properties that govern the volume of the content of the container: , , and . 这些值分别为300、4096和20的默认设置。These values have the default settings of 300, 4096, and 20 respectively. 当将添加到容器中时, 将使用这些属性来确定是否应丢弃中包含的, 以便为新的释放空间。 When a is added to the container, these properties are used to determine whether a already contained in the should be discarded to make room for the new one. 跟踪每个加法, 以确保不会超过或限制。 The keeps track of each addition to ensure that neither the nor the limits are exceeded. 如果超过其中一个或两个, 则将删除由保留的实例。If one or both are exceeded, then instances held by the are removed. 首先, 删除任何过期的。First, any expired is removed. 如果必须回收更多的容量, 则会清除最近使用的最小空间。If further capacity must be recaptured, then the least-recently used is purged.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性等于或超过属性, 则`cookie`会在添加参数之前从容器中删除一个或多个实例。 If the property equals or exceeds the property, one or more instances are removed from the container before adding the `cookie` parameter. 删除 了足够多的实例, 如下所示: 如果给定作用域中存在过期的实例, 它们会被清除。 Enough instances are removed to bring below as follows: if there are expired instances in the given scope, they are cleaned up. 如果不是, 则找到最近使用的最小的, 然后从容器中移除。If not, then the least recently used is found and removed from the container.

span.span: The to be added to the .

summary.span: 将 的内容添加到 中。

span.span: Adds the contents of a to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性等于属性, 则在添加`cookies`参数的内容之前, 将从容器中移除一个或多个实例。 If the property equals the property, one or more instances are removed from the container before adding the contents of the `cookies` parameter. 为了为提供空间, 删除了足够`cookies`的实例, 如下所示: 如果存在过期的实例, 则会清除它们。Enough instances are removed to make room for `cookies` as follows: if there are expired instances, they are cleaned up. 如果不是, 或者如果需要更多空间, 则找到最近使用的最小空间, 并将其从容器中删除。If not, or if more room is needed, then the least recently used is found and removed from the container.

param.name: uri
param.span: 要添加到 的 的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the to be added to the .
The to be added to the .

summary.span: 将 添加到特定 URI 的 中。

span.span: Adds a to the for a particular URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果只为一个特定主机添加实例, 请不要设置该实例的属性。If you add a instance for just one specific host, do not set the property of the instance. 这是根据 URI 自动设置的。This is set automatically, based on the URI. 如果 URI 对应于本地域并发送到本地域中的所有主机, 请将 属性设置为 "local"。If your URI corresponds to your local domain and sends to all the hosts on the local domain, set the property equal to ".local". 否则, 请确保它与 URI 中使用的主机名匹配。Otherwise, make sure it matches the host name used in the URI. 如果的属性为 Netscape, 则的属性 (如果未显式设置) 派生自 uri, 是来自 uri 的完整路径, 包括页名称。 If the property of a is Netscape, the property of the , if not set explicitly, is derived from the URI and is the complete path from the URI, including the page name. 如果属性等于属性, 则`cookie`会在添加参数之前从容器中删除一个或多个实例。 If the property equals the property, one or more instances are removed from the container before adding the `cookie` parameter. 删除 了足够多的实例, 如下所示: 如果作用域中存在过期的实例, 这些实例将被清除。 Enough instances are removed to bring below as follows: if there are expired instances in scope, they are cleaned up. 如果不是, 则找到最近使用的最小的, 然后从容器中移除。If not, then the least recently used is found and removed from the container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果只为一个特定主机添加实例, 请不要设置该实例的属性。If you add a instance for just one specific host, do not set the property of the instance. 这是根据 URI 自动设置的。This is set automatically, based on the URI. 如果 URI 对应于本地域并发送到本地域中的所有主机, 请将 属性设置为 "local"。If your URI corresponds to your local domain and sends to all the hosts on the local domain, set the property equal to ".local". 否则, 请确保它与 URI 中使用的主机名匹配。Otherwise, make sure it matches the host name used in the URI. 如果 等于 ,`cookie`则会在添加参数之前从容器中移除一个或多个实例。If equals , one or more instances is removed from the container before adding the `cookie` parameter. 删除了足够多的实例 , 如下所示: 在清理它们的范围内有过期的实例。Enough instances are removed to bring below as follows: if there are expired instances in scope they are cleaned up. 如果不是, 则找到最近使用的最小的, 然后从容器中移除。If not, then the least recently used is found and removed from the container.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetCookieHeader(class System.Uri uri) cil managed

param.name: uri
param.span: 所需的 实例的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the instances desired.

summary.span: 获取 HTTP Cookie 标头，该标头包含表示与特定 URI 关联的 实例的 HTTP Cookie。

span.span: Gets the HTTP cookie header that contains the HTTP cookies that represent the instances that are associated with a specific URI.

returns.span: 一个 HTTP Cookie 标头，其中包含表示由分号分隔的 实例的字符串。

span.span: An HTTP cookie header, with strings representing instances delimited by semicolons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回一个字符串, 该字符串保存由 `uri`指定的实例的 HTTP cookie 标头。 returns a string that holds the HTTP cookie header for the instances specified by `uri`. 通过添加每个 `uri`关联的的字符串表示形式来生成 HTTP 标头。The HTTP header is built by adding a string representation of each associated with `uri`. 请注意, 字符串的确切格式取决于符合的 RFC。Note that the exact format of the string depends on the RFC that the conforms to. 与`uri`关联的所有实例的字符串都由分号组合和分隔。The strings for all the instances that are associated with `uri` are combined and delimited by semicolons. 此字符串的格式不正确, 无法用作方法的第二个参数。This string is not in the correct format for use as the second parameter of the method.

span.span: is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将创建的新实例。A new instance of a is created. 然后, 将读取与指定 URI 关联的内部集合中的实例并将其添加到新的中。Then the instances in the internal collection that are associated with the specified URI are read out and added to the new .

summary.span: 获取或设置 可以在每个域包含的 实例数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of instances that a can hold per domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果新值小于当前值, 并且任何域集合包含的实例数多于新值, 则集合将被修剪为合适大小。If the new value is less than the current value, and if any of the domain collections contain more instances than the new value, the collections are pruned to fit. 这将使用属性中所述的相同基本规则。This uses the same basic rules as described in the property. 但是, 这只对此域的集合执行清理。However, this does the clean-up only on the collection for this domain.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetCookies (Uri uri, string cookieHeader);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetCookies(class System.Uri uri, string cookieHeader) cil managed
public: void SetCookies(Uri ^ uri, System::String ^ cookieHeader);

span.span: The URI of the .

param.name: cookieHeader
param.span: HTTP 服务器所返回的 HTTP Set-Cookie 标头的内容，其中的 实例用逗号分隔。

span.span: The contents of an HTTP set-cookie header as returned by a HTTP server, with instances delimited by commas.

summary.span: 将 HTTP Cookie 标头中的一个或多个 Cookie 的 实例添加到特定 URI 的 中。

span.span: Adds instances for one or more cookies from an HTTP cookie header to the for a specific URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 http cookie 标头提取所有 http cookie, 为每个 cookie 生成一个, 然后将每个 cookie 添加到与该 URI 关联的内部。 pulls all the HTTP cookies out of the HTTP cookie header, builds a for each one, and then adds each to the internal that is associated with the URI. `cookieHeader`字符串中的 HTTP cookie 必须用逗号分隔。The HTTP cookies in the `cookieHeader` string must be delimited by commas.

span.span: or is .

exception.span: 某一个 Cookie 是无效的。

span.span: One of the cookies is invalid.
-or-

span.span: An error occurred while adding one of the cookies to the container.
